original_title: 制作部入社1年目 アシスタントディレクター 森川玉緒 AV出演！
overview: Tamao Morikawa who manages the days of AD work. She is a male employee, but she is a friendly female employee who is also popular in the company. One day, when she saw Morikawa holding a camera on the scene, her senior director Pa Komachi suddenly thought, "Isn't this child also interested in being photographed?" Morikawa decides to appear on AV! She has little experience as a man, but her sensitivity is outstanding! Finished in a very erotic work!
title: During Her First After Joining The Production Department Of The Company, Assistant Director Tamao Morikawa Appears In An Adult Video!
